entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @9NewsAUS #auspol Firstly, not Australia actually leading way for an explanation into start of Covid19, it is U.S who want to get as much mileage as can out of it as a poor excuse to gain support for their activities in South China sea. Why would China think an investigation would be fair?
